title: Check if Prime
description: A basic python code that checks if a given number is prime.
code: print("-------------------------------------------------") a = int(input("ENTER A NUMBER TO CHECK IF IT'S PRIME: ")) print("-------------------------------------------------") is_prime = True if a <= 1:     is_prime = False else:     for i in range(2, int(a**0.5) + 1):         if a % i == 0:             is_prime = False             break if is_prime:     print(f"{a} IS A PRIME NUMBER!") else:     print(f"{a} IS NOT A PRIME NUMBER!") print("---------------------------------------------------")
